member.name: M:ESFA.DC.PublicApi.AS.Controllers.IlrDataController.GetProviders(System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: filter based on when provider file submission date time - this date time will be used to get records from that date time onwards
member.returns: List of providers dto with response header named "X-pagination" for paging information containing following int TotalItems int PageNumber int PageSize int TotalPages.

member.summary: Get learners and learning deliveries based on filter criteria
member.remarks: Records can be filtered by passing either no filter criteria, ukprn or start datetime (passing ukprn and start date time together will result in 400 error)
member.param: filter based on when provider file submission date time - this date time will be used to get records from that date time onwards
pass this value in if learners should be filtered by a ukprn
passing Null will return learners with ANY learning delivery => standard code null, pass -1 if all learners should be returned regardless of standard code value for learning delivery
Ignore the parameter to include all fund models or add fund model values as parameter(s). Learners will be filtered based on having at least one of the learning delivery with matching fund model(s)
passing Null will return learners with ANY learning delivery => prog type null, pass -1 if all learners should be returned regardless of prog type value for learning delivery
member.returns: List of learners dto with response header named "X-pagination" for paging information containing following int TotalItems int PageNumber int PageSize int TotalPages.
